thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Zach W
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Zach W

author: Zach W
title: Zach W
text: Unless you're looking for something used, or you live in NY/NJ, It's honestly just not worth shopping anywhere. Free shipping; no taxes; as low prices as any other place on the internet; great return policy; they have almost everything you could ever need; they have a reliable archive of reviews (from people who actually know what they're talking about, mostly); and I've just never had a problem buying from them. The only thing I wish they had – why I'm only giving them 4 stars – was a loyalty program so I got credits for future stuff based on my shopping history. I feel like Adorama does this, and it's a real bummer they don't.
